page.title: 02FIRE SERVICE COLLEGE MORETON
page.content: The{Fire College}at Moreton-in-Marsh is unique because it is the only college in the world that teaches firemen skills in leadership and trains firemen to be Fire Officers.The fire college{first}came into use in 1968.The building was completed in 1976.The college was opened by the Queen in 1974 and the opening was attended by many local people.It was first used for the training of the R.A.F.,Army and A.F.S.during World War 2,teaching fire-fighting methods. The Government spends 6,000,000 pounds on the College each year.Each year 4600 students are taught,470 students at a time.Seventy countries send their firemen and officers to be trained at the College.There are{courses}for Junior Officers,Officers Advancement, Station Command and Fire Prevention. There is much specialized equipment.
